<<<<<<< HEAD
By the King, a proclamation for the re-printing, publishing, and using of a book, intituled, God and the King England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II) Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.
1 broadside.
Printed by John Bill and Christopher Barker ..., London : 1662.
"Given at the court at Whitehall, December the fifth, 1662, in the fourteenth year of our reign." Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
=======

1 broadside.
Printed by John Bill and Christopher Barker ..., London : 1662.
"Given at the court at Whitehall, December the fifth, 1662, in the fourteenth year of our reign." Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
Christopher Barker
John Bill
